mapper.select: SELECT BREAD_NO, BREAD_NAME, CATEGORY_NAME, PRICE, BREAD_CONTENT, CALORIES, ALLERGY, IMAGE_ORIGIN FROM BREAD LEFT JOIN DETAIL_BREAD USING(BREAD_NO) LEFT JOIN BREAD_CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) WHERE STATUS = 1 ORDER BY BREAD_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO BREAD( BREAD_NAME, CATEGORY_NO, PRICE )VALUES( #{breadName}, #{categoryNo}, #{price} ) INTO DETAIL_BREAD( BREAD_CONTENT, CALORIES, ALLERGY, IMAGE_ORIGIN, IMAGE_CHANGE )VALUES( #{breadContent}, #{calories}, #{allergy}, #{imageOrigin}, #{imageChange} ) SELECT*FROM DUAL
mapper.update: UPDATE BREAD SET BREAD_NAME = #{breadName}, CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo) WHERE = BREAD_NO = #{breadNo}
UPDATE BREAD SET BREAD_CONTENT = #{breadContent}, CALORIES = #{calories}, ALLERGY = #{allergy}, IMAGE_ORIGIN = #{imageOrigin}, IMAGE_CHANGE = #{imageChange} WHERE = BREAD_NO = #{breadNo}
